categories: Category:Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection departments

nodes.text: Movie Magic is a behind-the-scenes section of Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection magazine: a sequence of captioned images demonstrating the creative process behind the featured vehicle of an issue. This same vehicle is highlighted on the issue's cover and, in the form of a die-cast collector's model, is packed in exclusively with the magazine.
